name:
Maliss

Chessy Cat
effectText:
Any monster destroyed by battle with a "Maliss" Link Monster that points to this card is banished. You can only use each of the following effects of "Maliss

Chessy Cat" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can banish 1 "Maliss" card from your hand, then you can draw 2 cards. If this card is banished: You can pay 300 LP; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Link Monsters.
